Structs/YCoreUI.html#/s:7YCoreUIAAV16isL.abstract: Whether console logging for warnings is enabled. Defaults to true.

Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.name: xOffset
Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.abstract: Specifies the horizontal offset of the shadow.

Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.name: yOffset
Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.abstract: Specifies the vertical offset of the shadow.

Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.name: useShadowPath
Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.abstract: Whether apply(layer:cornerRadius:) should set the shadowPath. Defaults to true.

Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.name: extent
Structs/Elevation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Eleva.abstract: Computes how far from the edges of the view the shadow will extend in each direction.

Structs/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Anima.name: duration
Structs/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Anima.abstract: Duration of the animation (in seconds). Defaults to 0.3.

Structs/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Anima.name: delay
Structs/Animation.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Anima.abstract: Delay of the animation (in seconds). Defaults to 0.0.

Structs/Elevation.html.name: Elevation
Structs/Elevation.html.abstract: Encapsulates design shadows and applies them to a layer.

Protocols/SystemImage.html#/s:7YCoreUI11.name: fallbackImage

Protocols/SystemImage.html#/s:7YCoreUI11.name: renderingMode

Protocols/ImageAsset.html#/s:7YCoreUI10I.name: bundle

Protocols/ImageAsset.html#/s:7YCoreUI10I.name: namespace
Protocols/ImageAsset.html#/s:7YCoreUI10I.abstract: Optional namespace for the image assets (default is nil).

Protocols/ImageAsset.html#/s:7YCoreUI10I.abstract: An image asset for this name value.

Protocols/Colorable.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Col.name: bundle

Protocols/Colorable.html#/s:7YCoreUI9Col.name: fallbackColor

Protocols/Anchorable.html#/s:7YCoreUI10A.name: leftAnchor

Protocols/Anchorable.html#/s:7YCoreUI10A.name: rightAnchor
Protocols/Anchorable.html#/s:7YCoreUI10A.abstract: Right anchor (most often you should use trailingAnchor instead)

Protocols/Colorable.html.name: Colorable
Protocols/Colorable.html.abstract: Any named color asset that can be loaded from an asset catalog (primarily for use with string-based enums).

Protocols/ImageAsset.html.name: ImageAsset
Protocols/ImageAsset.html.abstract: Any named image asset can be loaded from an asset catalog.

Protocols/Localizable.html.name: Localizable
Protocols/Localizable.html.abstract: Any string resource that can be localized (primarily for use with string-based enums)

Protocols/SystemImage.html.name: SystemImage
Protocols/SystemImage.html.abstract: Any string corresponding to a system image (SF Symbols).
